uda_id.description: This field contains a number identifying the user-defined attribute.

uda_text.description: Functional key that uniquely identifies the change to the item_master, item_supplier, item_supp_country, item_supp_country_dim, packitem, item_image, uda_item tables that caused the record to be written to the ITEM_MFQUEUE. Item, uda_id and uda_text uniquely identify an uda_item_ff.
